short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transaction downloads and other powerful enhancements for BTCJam Investors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BTCInvestorGuide is built by AT and TonyB, two software developers who’ve developed a passion for BTCJam over the last few months.

We decided we wanted to share our tools with everyone, instead of keeping them to ourselves. We’re excited about our work thus far, but we’ve only scratched the surface of our plans. There’s much more to come.


RELEASE NOTES

v. 1.0.10

Investment Summary: Filter by currency
Investment Summary: Added Total Repaid, Grand Totals

v. 1.0.9
Investment Summary/CSV and Receivables CSV: Data now refreshes when a listing activates
Limit inclusion of our donation text to only the pages where it needs to be shown



v. 1.0.8
Transactions Download: added listingid for note purchases/sales
Transactions dataset loads changes faster by only loading new transactions
Dates in all downloads are all in UTC to be consistent with BTCJam's onscreen dates

v. 1.0.7
Investments Download: added listing credit score (Suggested by @RustyH17!)
Investments Download: added payment type (Monthly, weekly, 1st of Month, etc)
Investments Download: added listing term days (7,14,30,90,180,365)
Investments Download: renamed listingAmount to listingAmountRequested
Investments Download: added listingAmountFunded
UI: Added logo to all BTCInvestorGuide modals

v. 1.0.5

Investments download - currency type column added. (Suggested by @RustyH17!)
Expanded help content for investment summary by loan status table
Added help content for CSV downloads
Dashboard Feedback button opens in a new tab



v. 1.0.4

Investments download: corrected issue that caused incorrect numbers for some rows. (Thanks @RustyH17!)
Added Feedback button to Dashboard Panel

v. 1.0.2 - Initial Public Release

Investments Summary by Loan Status
Ability to export investments, transactions and receivables to CSV
Version information on dashboard
